title: Reform UK's Welsh leader Dan Thomas announced by Nigel Farage at rally in Newport
desc: Dan Thomas will lead the party at the Senedd election in May, with polling showing Reform performing strongly.

title: Andy Lau's Malaysian wife Carol Chu makes rare public appearance in China
desc: Lau and Chu, who married in 2008, have largely kept their private life out of the spotlight.

title: Eazzy Shows the Face of Her Son With Medikal for the First Time
desc: Ghanaian musician Eazzy showcased her son Space's face for the first time in a Snapchat video, prompting joy over his resemblance to rapper Medikal.

title: Sonko testifies in Ksh.20M graft case, says powerful individuals behind it
desc: Former Nairobi Governor Mike Mbuvi Sonko on Thursday defended himself in a Ksh.20 million corruption case, telling the court that the charges against him stem from his public opposition to corruption and land grabbing.

title: West Bengal announces 4% dearness allowance increase for govt employees in interim budget
desc: Alongside the DA hike, the government also announced a Rs 500 monthly increase for beneficiaries under the popular ‘Laxmi Bhandar’ scheme. The enhanced amount will come into effect from February.

title: businessman's lawyer plans to apply for stay
desc: The lawyer representing Canadian businessman Frank Stronach in his Toronto sexual assault trial says she is planning to apply for a stay of proceedings over concerns that some witnesses were coached by prosecutors.

title: ‘A Pale View of Hills,’ a drama of post-war Japan
desc: It’s an adaptation of the first novel by Kazuo Ishiguro, a Japanese-British novelist who won the Nobel Prize for Literature in 2017, and it stars some of Japan’s best-loved actors.

title: 'We need to know she's alive': US news anchor pleads for return of her abducted mother
desc: In a video message, Savannah Guthrie called for proof that her 84-year-old mother Nancy Guthrie is alive.

title: Jimmy Kimmel Hints ‘Melania’ Box Office Was a ‘Rigged Outcome’
desc: Late night hosts were skeptical of a $7 million opening weekend for the new Amazon film about the first lady.

title: Maid 'from hell' charged for assaulting a 1-year-old
desc: A 30-year-old Boitumelo Nchimako appeared before the Broadhurst Magistrate's Court this morning, charged with cruel punishment.
